message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a novel evaluation protocol for scene text detection, which is a computer vision task (cs.CV). The paper also discusses issues related to text recognition and scoring, which are relevant to natural language processing (cs.CL) and information retrieval (cs.IR). The proposed evaluation protocol is based on a firm standard rewarding behaviors, which can be seen as a reinforcement learning problem, relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
